#### Paper Coating {#coat-indcom-paper}

```{r petprod-coat-indcom-paper-setup}
PAPER_CATEGORIES <- c(
  "#258 Paper Ctg." = 258,
  "#259 Paper C/U" = 259, # "C/U" means "cleanup solvent"
  "#1916 Paper Ctg. (Area)" = 1916,
  "#1917 Paper C/U (Area)" = 1917)
```

##### History {-}

```{r petprod-coat-indcom-paper-annual_emissions-chart}
BY2011_annual_emission_data %>%
  filter_categories(
    PAPER_CATEGORIES) %>%
  chart_BY2011_annual_emissions_by(
    fill = category) 
```

##### Emission Factors (Area) {-}

```{r petprod-coat-indcom-paper-annual_emission_factor-chart}
BY2011_annual_area_source_emission_factor_data %>%
  filter_categories(
    PAPER_CATEGORIES) %>%
  chart_BY2011_annual_emission_factors_by(
    color = category)
```

##### Growth {-}

```{r petprod-coat-indcom-paper-annual_growth-chart, fig.height=6, out.height=600}
BY2011_annual_growth_factor_data %>%
```
